title: Dil Bechara (2020)
summary: The emotional journey of two hopelessly in love youngsters, a young girl, Kizie, suffering from cancer, and a boy, Manny, who she meets at a support group.

title: Greyhound (2020)
summary: Early in World War II, an inexperienced U.S. Navy captain must lead an Allied convoy being stalked by Nazi U-boat wolfpacks.

title: M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story (2016)
summary: The untold story of Mahendra Singh Dhoni's journey from ticket collector to trophy collector - the world-cup-winning captain of the Indian Cricket Team.
